demo_scheduling.agent: Namaste! Aap ERP ka demo lena chahenge?
Main aapke liye ek meeting schedule kar sakta hoon!

candidate_interviewing.agent: Aap thoda apne experience ke baare mein bata sakte hain?
Bahut badhiya! Aapki skills kya hain?

payment_followup.agent: Aapka last payment ab tak process nahi hua hai. Kya main aapki madad kar sakta hoon?
Theek hai! Kab tak expect karein?
